mapper.insert: insert into members_table (memberId, memberPassword, memberName, memberDept, memberPosition, memberJoinDate, memberIdNum, memberBirthDay, memberAddress, memberEmail, memberMobile, memberProfileName, salary, educationLv, career, certificate) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberDept}, #{memberPosition}, now(), #{memberIdNum}, #{memberBirthDay}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberMobile}, #{memberProfileName}, #{salary}, #{educationLv}, #{career}, #{certificate})
mapper.select: select * from members_table where memberId=#{memberId} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
mapper.update: update members_table set memberPassword=#{memberPassword}, memberDept=#{memberDept}, memberPosition=#{memberPosition}, memberAddress=#{memberAddress}, memberEmail=#{memberEmail}, memberMobile=#{memberMobile},memberProfileName=#{memberProfileName}, salary=#{salary}, educationLv=#{educationLv}, career=#{career}, certificate=#{certificate} where id=#{id}
